title: AceTrainerStorme (u/AceTrainerStorme) - Reddit
body: 3 or more plastic 5-gallon buckets (20L) 1 toilet seat 6 wood screws 3 small pieces of wood that function as cleats — Approximately, 1 inch (2.5 cm) wide by 3 inches long (8 cm) by 3/4 inch deep (2 cm) 1 compost chamber — Mine is constructed from recycled wooden pallets held together by wire at the corners. Tools. Wood saw
